ExploreFact.Text: The Precursors built something called the "first node", which had an energy collecting disk.

RumorFact.Text: The Precursors built what they called an "access hatch", although they did not believe "access hatch" accurately described what they built.
The surviving Precursors say I must use the access hatch to enter the Core.

ExploreFact.Text: The surviving Precursors say the access hatch is directly in the path of the weapon's beam, and to use the access hatch I must stand in their midst a few seconds before the weapon activates.
I found living Precursors on Sunbaked Stone! They are clustered around a fire in the crater, and they tell me to come back when I already know who they are... whatever that means.
These Precursors say that they are the only surviving Precursors in the system, the four others were lost due to the cryopods malfunctioning with age.
The surviving Precursors say they never heard back from their home system, but they're surely all gone by now.
